Package com.orientechnologies.orient.core.security

Class ODefaultSecuritySystem

java.lang.Object
com.orientechnologies.orient.core.security.ODefaultSecuritySystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
OSecuritySystem
public class ODefaultSecuritySystem extends Object implements OSecuritySystem
Provides an implementation of OServerSecurity.
Author:
S. Colin Leister

    • getSystemUser

      public OSecurityUser getSystemUser(String username, String dbName)
      Returns the "System User" associated with 'username' from the system database. If not found, returns null. dbName is used to filter the assigned roles. It may be null.
      Specified by:
